## Description

A clear description of what the bug is.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Run command `vpo ...`
2. With this input...
3. See error

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened. Include error messages if any.

## Environment

- **VPO Version**: (run `vpo --version`)
- **Python Version**: (run `python --version`)
